# Data Exploration
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=8)
```

```{r}
wines <- read.csv("wineQualityReds.csv")
library("GGally")
```

```{r}
dim(wines)
```

```{r}
str(wines)
```
```{r}
summary(wines)
```
```{r}
cor(wines[, c(2:13)])
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = quality), data = wines) + 
  geom_histogram(position = "jitter")
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = quality, y = alcohol), data = wines) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 5/10, position = position_jitter(h = 0), color = "orange") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = .5)
```
```{r}
ggpairs(wines[, c(2:13)])
```
